description: Endometrioid adenocarcinoma of the uterus measuring 7.7 cm with superficial myometrial invasion (<50%), grade 1, no lymphovascular invasion, and negative pelvic lymph nodes consistent with pathologic stage pT1b pN0.
patient_notes: You have early-stage, low-grade uterine cancer that was fully removed and has not spread to lymph nodes. To reduce the risk of the cancer returning in the vagina, we recommend a targeted radiation treatment called vaginal brachytherapy. We will also schedule regular follow-up visits to monitor your health.

verification.assessment: The extracted data accurately reflects the pathology report’s staging, subtype, and recommended adjuvant therapy based on NCCN guidelines. Medical inference validation identified issues: Endometrioid adenocarcinoma with <50% myometrial invasion and grade 1 is FIGO stage IA (pT1a) and low-risk, advising observation per NCCN guidelines.
